eventDecorators.name: Approval
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the approval amount for the spender of a given owner's tokens changes. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

functionDecorators.name: allowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current allowance given to a spender by an owner.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Sets the allowance of a spender from the `msg.sender` to the value `amount`.

parameterDecorators.name: spender
parameterDecorators.description: The account which will be allowed to spend a given amount of the owners tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens allowed to be used by `spender`.

returnDecorators.description: Returns true for a successful approval, false for unsuccessful.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Returns the balance of a token.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the amount of token from the `msg.sender` to the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The account that will receive the amount transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to send from the sender to the recipient.

returnDecorators.description: Returns true for a successful transfer, false for an unsuccessful transfer.

functionDecorators.name: transferFrom
functionDecorators.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` up to the allowance given to the `msg.sender`.

parameterDecorators.name: sender
parameterDecorators.description: The account from which the transfer will be initiated.

returnDecorators.description: Returns true for a successful transfer, false for unsuccessful.
